video.title: Intro to Node.js and npm
video.description:
Learn all about to node and npm!

Talk by Logan Huskins at the freeCodeCamp OKC meetup. Thanks to Techlahoma for giving us permission to share.

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org
